A Math Challenge

LOJ138 + 自然数幂和。

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Sun Aug 15 21:59:21 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;
constexpr int P(998244353);
inline void inc(int &x, int y) {
  x += y;
  if (x >= P) x -= P;
}
inline void dec(int &x, int y) {
  x -= y;
  if (x < 0) x += P;
}
inline int mod(LL x) {
  return x % P;
}
int fpow(int x, int k = P - 2) {
  int r = 1;
  for (; k; k >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P) {
    if (k & 1) r = 1LL * r * x % P;
  }
  return r;
}
struct Z {
  int x;
  Z(int v = 0) : x(v < 0 ? v + P : v >= P ? v - P : v) {}
  Z inv() const {
    assert(x);
    return Z(fpow(x));
  }
  Z pow(int k) const {
    return Z(fpow(x, k));
  }
  Z &operator+=(const Z &r) {
    inc(x, r.x);
    return *this;
  }
  Z &operator-=(const Z &r) {
    dec(x, r.x);
    return *this;
  }
  Z &operator*=(const Z &r) {
    x = 1LL * x * r.x % P;
    return *this;
  }
  Z &operator/=(const Z &r) {
    x = 1LL * x * fpow(r.x) % P;
    return *this;
  }
  Z operator+(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) += r;
  }
  Z operator-(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) -= r;
  }
  Z operator*(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) *= r;
  }
  Z operator/(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) /= r;
  }
  Z operator-() const {
    return Z(P - x);
  }
  operator int() const {
    return x;
  }
};
Z bin[52][52], inv[52];
struct Info {
  Z i, x, f[52][52];
  Info() : i(0), x(0) {
    memset(f, 0, sizeof f);
  }
};
int n, m;
Info operator*(Info a, Info b) {
  Info c;
  c.i = a.i + b.i;
  c.x = a.x + b.x;
  for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
    for (int j = 0; j <= m; j++) {
      c.f[i][j] = a.f[i][j];
    }
  }
  Z u = 1, v, bu;
  for (int j = 0; j <= n; j++, u *= a.i) {
    for (int p = j; p <= n; p++) {
      bu = bin[p][j] * u, v = 1;
      for (int k = 0; k <= m; k++, v *= a.x) {
        for (int q = k; q <= m; q++) {
          c.f[p][q] += bu * bin[q][k] * v * b.f[p - j][q - k];
        }
      }
    }
  }
  return c;
}
Info fpow(Info x, LL k) {
  Info r;
  for (; k; k >>= 1, x = x * x) {
    if (k & 1) r = r * x;
  }
  return r;
}
LL div(LL p, LL i, LL r, LL q) {
  return (p * i + r) / q; 
}
Info cal(LL p, LL r, LL q, LL n, const Info &x, const Info &y) {
  if (n < 0) return Info();
  if (r >= q) {
    return fpow(y, r / q) * cal(p, r % q, q, n, x, y);
  }
  if (p >= q) {
    return x * cal(p % q, p % q + r, q, n - 1, fpow(y, p / q) * x, y);
  }
  if (p == 0) {
    return fpow(x, n + 1);
  }
  LL m = div(p, n, r, q);
  return cal(q, q - r + p - 1, p, m - 1, y, x) * fpow(x, n + 1 - (!m ? 0 : div(q, m, p - r - 1, p)));
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  for (int i = 0; i <= 51; i++) {
    bin[i][0] = 1;
    for (int j = 1; j <= i; j++) {
      bin[i][j] = bin[i - 1][j] + bin[i - 1][j - 1];
    }
  }
  int a, b, c, p, q, n;
  std::cin >> a >> b >> c >> p >> q >> n;
  q++;
  ::n = p, ::m = q;
  Info x, y;
  x.i = x.f[0][0] = y.x = 1;
  auto pw = cal(a, b, c, n, x, y);
  {
    std::vector<std::vector<Z>> a(q, std::vector<Z>(q + 1));
    Z sum = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {
      for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) {
        a[i][j] = fpow(i + 1, j + 1);
      }
      a[i].back() = sum += fpow(i + 1, q - 1);
    }
    for (int i = 0, j; i < q; i++) {
      for (j = i; j < q; j++) {
        if (!a[j][i]) continue;
        std::swap(a[i], a[j]);
        break;
      }
      assert(a[i][i]);
      Z inv = a[i][i].inv();
      for (int k = 0; k <= q; k++) a[i][k] *= inv;
      for (j = 0; j < q; j++) {
        if (j == i || !a[j][i]) continue;
        for (int k = q; k >= i; k--) {
          a[j][k] -= a[j][i] * a[i][k];
        }
      }
    }
    Z ans;
    for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {
      ans += pw.f[p][i + 1] * a[i].back();
    }
    std::cout << ans << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

Best Subgraph

Cells

Divide-and-conquer on Tree

Eyjafjalla

Financial Order Execution

Glass Balls

Solution 1

很难直接计算 \(f(i)\)​ 。

考虑条件期望，设事件 \(C_i\) 表示点 \(i\) 合法，即最多有一个儿子可以放行，事件 \(N_i\) 表示 \(i\) 到根这条路上的点合法，事件 \(N\) 表示整棵树合法。

设 \(X_{i, s}\)​​ 表示球 \(i\)​​ 从 \(s\)​​ 开始，不考虑碰撞答案清零，会经过多少条边，特别地，记 \(X_i = X_{i, i}\)​​。

可以发现，\(X_{i,s}\) 只和 \(i\) 到根的路径上的情况有关，和其他事件是独立的，所以有 \[ \begin{aligned} E(X|N) &= \sum_{}E(X_i|N)\\ &= \sum\sum x\frac{P(X_i = x,N)}{P(N)}\\ &= \sum\sum x\frac{P(X_i = x,N_{f_i}, N-N_{f_i})}{P(N_{f_i}, N-N_{f_i})}\\ &= \sum\sum x\frac{P(X_i = x,N_{f_i})}{P(N_{f_i})}\\ &= \sum E(X_i|N_{f_i}) \end{aligned} \] 设 \(Y_i\) 表示 \(i\) 的儿子中可以通过的是哪个（可以都没有，此时 \(Y=0\) ）。

根据期望的线性性，有 \[ \begin{aligned} E(X_i | N_{f_i}) &= E((X_{i, f_i} + 1) | N_{f_i})\\ &= E(X_{i, f_i}|N_{f_i}) + P(Y_{f_i} = i | N_{f_i})\\ &= [E(X_{f_i}|N_{f_{f_i}}) + 1]P(Y_{f_i} = i | C_{f_i})\\ \end{aligned} \] 答案是 \(E(X, N) = E(X|N)P(N)\)​。

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Sat Aug 14 21:08:18 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;
constexpr int P(998244353);
inline void inc(int &x, int y) {
  x += y;
  if (x >= P) x -= P;
}
inline void dec(int &x, int y) {
  x -= y;
  if (x < 0) x += P;
}
inline int mod(LL x) {
  return x % P;
}
int fpow(int x, int k = P - 2) {
  int r = 1;
  for (; k; k >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P) {
    if (k & 1) r = 1LL * r * x % P;
  }
  return r;
}
struct Z {
  int x;
  Z(int v = 0) : x(v < 0 ? v + P : v >= P ? v - P : v) {}
  Z inv() const {
    assert(x);
    return Z(fpow(x));
  }
  Z pow(int k) const {
    return Z(fpow(x, k));
  }
  Z &operator+=(const Z &r) {
    inc(x, r.x);
    return *this;
  }
  Z &operator-=(const Z &r) {
    dec(x, r.x);
    return *this;
  }
  Z &operator*=(const Z &r) {
    x = 1LL * x * r.x % P;
    return *this;
  }
  Z &operator/=(const Z &r) {
    x = 1LL * x * fpow(r.x) % P;
    return *this;
  }
  Z operator+(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) += r;
  }
  Z operator-(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) -= r;
  }
  Z operator*(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) *= r;
  }
  Z operator/(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) /= r;
  }
  Z operator-() const {
    return Z(P - x);
  }
  operator int() const {
    return x;
  }
};
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int n;
  Z p, np;
  std::cin >> n >> p.x;
  np = Z(1) - p;
  std::vector<std::vector<int>> g(n);
  for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
    int x;
    std::cin >> x;
    x--;
    g[x].push_back(i);
  }
  Z ans, prod = 1;
  std::function<void(int, Z)> dfs = [&](int x, Z d) {
    ans += d;
    if (!g[x].size()) {
      return;
    }
    Z k = p.pow(g[x].size() - 1) * np;
    Z v = k * Z(g[x].size()) + p.pow(g[x].size());
    prod *= v;
    k /= v;
    for (int y : g[x]) {
      dfs(y, (d + Z(1)) * k);
    }
  };
  dfs(0, 0);
  std::cout << ans * prod << "\n";
  return 0;
}

Solution 2

将起点和终点交换，考虑计算每个点向下能走多少距离。

设 \(f(i)\) 表示在 \(i\) 的子树合法的情况下，\(i\) 向下走的距离，\(s(i)\) 表示在 \(i\) 的子树合法的情况下，\(i\) 子树的答案和，\(v(i)\) 表示 \(i\) 的子树合法的概率。

详细推导略。

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Sun Aug 15 10:11:38 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;
constexpr int P(998244353);
inline void inc(int &x, int y) {
  x += y;
  if (x >= P) x -= P;
}
inline void dec(int &x, int y) {
  x -= y;
  if (x < 0) x += P;
}
inline int mod(LL x) {
  return x % P;
}
int fpow(int x, int k = P - 2) {
  int r = 1;
  for (; k; k >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P) {
    if (k & 1) r = 1LL * r * x % P;
  }
  return r;
}
struct Z {
  int x;
  Z(int v = 0) : x(v < 0 ? v + P : v >= P ? v - P : v) {}
  Z inv() const {
    assert(x);
    return Z(fpow(x));
  }
  Z pow(int k) const {
    return Z(fpow(x, k));
  }
  Z &operator+=(const Z &r) {
    inc(x, r.x);
    return *this;
  }
  Z &operator-=(const Z &r) {
    dec(x, r.x);
    return *this;
  }
  Z &operator*=(const Z &r) {
    x = 1LL * x * r.x % P;
    return *this;
  }
  Z &operator/=(const Z &r) {
    x = 1LL * x * fpow(r.x) % P;
    return *this;
  }
  Z operator+(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) += r;
  }
  Z operator-(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) -= r;
  }
  Z operator*(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) *= r;
  }
  Z operator/(const Z &r) const {
    return Z(*this) /= r;
  }
  Z operator-() const {
    return Z(P - x);
  }
  operator int() const {
    return x;
  }
};
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int n;
  std::cin >> n;
  Z p;
  std::cin >> p.x;
  Z np = Z(1) - p;
  std::vector<std::vector<int>> g(n);
  for (int i = 1, x; i < n; i++) {
    std::cin >> x;
    g[x - 1].push_back(i);
  }
  std::vector<Z> f(n), s(n), v(n);
  std::function<void(int)> dfs = [&](int x) {
    v[x] = 1;
    if (!g[x].size()) {
      return;
    }
    for (int y : g[x]) {
      dfs(y);
      v[x] *= v[y];
    }
    Z k = p.pow(g[x].size() - 1) * np;
    Z c = k * Z(g[x].size()) + p.pow(g[x].size());
    for (int y : g[x]) {
      Z py = v[x] / v[y];
      s[x] += s[y] * py * c;
      f[x] += (f[y] + v[y]) * py * k;
    }
    v[x] *= c;
    s[x] += f[x];
  };
  dfs(0);
  std::cout << s[0] << "\n";
  return 0;
}

Incentive Model

item.title: 特征多项式小记
item.description:
HolyK's Blog https://blog.asukakyle.top/post/%E7%89%B9%E5%BE%81%E5%A4%9A%E9%A1%B9%E5%BC%8F%E5%B0%8F%E8%AE%B0/ -

Upper-Hessenberg 矩阵

\[ H_n = \begin{bmatrix} a_{0, 0} & a_{0, 1} & a_{0, 2} & a_{0, 3} & \cdots & a_{0, n - 1} & a_{0, n}\\ a_{1, 0} & a_{1, 1} & a_{1, 2} & a_{1, 3} & \cdots & a_{1, n - 1} & a_{1, n}\\ 0 & a_{2, 1} & a_{2, 2} & a_{2, 3} & \cdots & a_{2, n - 1} & a_{2, n}\\ 0 & 0 & a_{3, 2} & a_{3, 3} & \cdots & a_{3, n - 1} & a_{3, n}\\ \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \ddots & \ddots & \vdots & \vdots\\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & a_{n - 1, n-2} & a_{n - 1, n - 1} & a_{n - 1, n}\\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & a_{n, n - 1} & a_{n, n} \end{bmatrix} \]

设 \(h_n = \det H_n\)​，则 \[ \begin{aligned} h_n &= a_{n, n}h_{n-1} - a_{n, n-1} \begin{vmatrix} a_{0, 0} & a_{0, 1} & a_{0, 2} & a_{0, 3} & \cdots & a_{0, n}\\ a_{1, 0} & a_{1, 1} & a_{1, 2} & a_{1, 3} & \cdots & a_{1, n}\\ 0 & a_{2, 1} & a_{2, 2} & a_{2, 3} & \cdots & a_{2, n}\\ 0 & 0 & a_{3, 2} & a_{3, 3} & \cdots & a_{3, n}\\ \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \ddots & \ddots & \vdots\\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & a_{n - 1, n-2} & a_{n - 1, n}\\ \end{vmatrix}\\ &= a_{n, n}h_{n-1} - a_{n, n-1}\left( a_{n-1, n}h_{n-2} - a_{n-1, n-2} \begin{vmatrix} a_{0, 0} & a_{0, 1} & a_{0, 2} & \cdots & a_{0, n}\\ a_{1, 0} & a_{1, 1} & a_{1, 2} & \cdots & a_{1, n}\\ 0 & a_{2, 1} & a_{2, 2} & \cdots & a_{2, n}\\ 0 & 0 & a_{3, 2} & \cdots & a_{3, n}\\ \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \ddots & \vdots\\ 0 & 0 & 0 & a_{n - 2, n-3} & a_{n - 2, n}\\ \end{vmatrix}\\ \right)\\ &= \cdots\cdots\cdots\cdots\\ &= \sum_{i = 0}^{n-1}h_{n-1-i}\cdot(-1)^ia_{n-i, n}\prod_{j=0}^{i-1}a_{n-j, n-j-1} \end{aligned} \]

复杂度 \(O(n^3)\)。

std::vector<Z> charPoly(std::vector<std::vector<Z>> a) {
  int n = a.size();
  for (int j = 0; j < n - 2; j++) {
    for (int i = j + 1; i < n; i++) {
      if (!a[i][j]) continue;
      std::swap(a[i], a[j + 1]);
      for (int k = 0; k < n; k++) {
        std::swap(a[k][i], a[k][j + 1]);
      }
      break;
    }
    if (a[j + 1][j]) {
      auto inv = a[j + 1][j].inv();
      for (int i = j + 2; i < n; i++) {
        auto c = a[i][j] * inv;
        for (int k = 0; k < n; k++) a[i][k] -= a[j + 1][k] * c;
        for (int k = 0; k < n; k++) a[k][j + 1] += a[k][i] * c;
      }
    }
  }
  std::vector<std::vector<Z>> h(n + 1);
  h[0] = {1};
  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
    Z prod = 1;
    h[i + 1].resize(h[i].size() + 1);
    for (int j = 0; j < h[i].size(); j++) {
      h[i + 1][j + 1] = h[i][j];
      h[i + 1][j] -= h[i][j] * a[i][i];
    }
    for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {
      prod *= a[i - j][i - j - 1];
      auto c = a[i - j - 1][i] * prod;
      for (int k = 0; k < h[i - j - 1].size(); k++) {
        h[i + 1][k] -= h[i - j - 1][k] * c;
      }
    }
  }
  return h[n];
}
- https://blog.asukakyle.top/post/%E7%89%B9%E5%BE%81%E5%A4%9A%E9%A1%B9%E5%BC%8F%E5%B0%8F%E8%AE%B0/ - CC BY-NC-SA 4.0

item.title: 2021杭电多校8
item.description:
HolyK's Blog https://blog.asukakyle.top/post/2021hdu8/ -
题号 题目 完成情况
7056 X-liked Counting 通过
7057 Buying Snacks 通过
7058 Ink on paper 通过
7059 Counting Stars 通过
7060 Separated Number 通过
7061 GCD Game 通过
7062 A Simple Problem 通过
7063 Square Card 通过
7064 Singing Superstar 通过
7065 Yinyang

X-liked Counting

直接记忆化搜索常数比较大，一部分用for循环代替。

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Fri Aug 13 16:54:31 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

LL pw[20];
int m;
LL cal(LL x) {
  if (!x) return 1;
  
  static int a[20];
  static LL f[20], dp[20][500];
  int c = 0;
  for (; x; x /= 10) a[c++] = x % 10;
  std::reverse(a, a + c);
  memset(f, -1, sizeof f);
  std::function<LL(int, bool, bool)> dfs = [&](int p, bool lim, bool lead) -> LL {
    if (p == c) return 1;
    if (!lim && !lead && ~f[p]) return f[p];
    LL ans = 0;
    int up = lim ? a[p] : 9;
    for (int i = 0; i <= up; i++) {
      if (i == 7) continue;
      ans += dfs(p + 1, lim && i == up, lead && i == 0);
    }
    if (!lim && !lead) f[p] = ans;
    return ans;
  };
  LL ans = dfs(0, true, true);
  for (int i = 1; i < m; i++) {
    for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
      dp[c][j] = j == i;
    }
    for (int j = c - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
      for (int k = 0; k < m; k++) {
        dp[j][k] = 0;
        if (!k || k * pw[c - j] % m == i) continue;
        for (int x = 0; x < 10; x++) {
          if (x == 7) continue;
          dp[j][k] += dp[j + 1][(k * 10 + x) % m];
        }
      }
    }
    // memset(dp, -1, sizeof dp);
    std::function<LL(int, int, bool, bool)> dfs = [&](int p, int r, bool lim, bool lead) -> LL {
      if (p == c) return r == i;
      if (!lead && (!r || r * pw[c - p] % m == i)) return 0;
      if (!lim && !lead && ~dp[p][r]) return dp[p][r];
      LL ans = 0;
      int up = lim ? a[p] : 9;
      for (int i = 0; i <= up; i++) {
        if (i == 7) continue;
        ans += dfs(p + 1, (r * 10 + i) % m, lim && i == up, lead && i == 0);
      }
      if (!lim && !lead) dp[p][r] = ans;
      return ans;
    };
    ans -= dfs(0, 0, true, true);
  }
  return ans;
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  pw[0] = 1;
  for (int i = 1; i <= 19; i++) pw[i] = 10LL * pw[i - 1];
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    LL l, r;
    std::cin >> l >> r >> m;
    std::cout << cal(r) - cal(l - 1) << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

Buying Snacks

\[\begin{aligned} A &= 1 + x + x^2\\ B &= x + 2x^2 + x^3\\ F_n &= AF_{n-1} + BF_{n-2}\\ \lambda^2-A\lambda - B = 0 &\Rightarrow \lambda = \frac{A \pm \sqrt{A^2+4B}}{2}\\ \sqrt{A^2+4B} &= 1 + 3x + x^2\\ \lambda_1 = 1+2x+x^2,& \lambda_2=-x\\ F_n &= P(1+2x+x^2)^n+Q(-x)^n\\ \begin{cases} F_0 &= 1\\ F_1 &= 1 + x + x ^2\\ \end{cases} &\Rightarrow \begin{cases} P &= \frac{1+2x+x^2}{1 + 3x + x^2} \\ Q &= \frac{x}{1 + 3x + x^2}\\ \end{cases}\\ F_n &= \frac{(1+x)^{2n+2}+(-1)^nx^{n+1}}{1 + 3x + x^2} \end{aligned}\]

复杂度 \(O(m)\)

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Thu Aug 12 18:52:53 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
constexpr int P(998244353);
inline void inc(int &x, int y) {
  x += y;
  if (x >= P) x -= P;
}
constexpr int N(4e4 + 5);
int a[N], inv[N];
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  inv[1] = 1;
  for (int i = 2; i <= 5e4; i++) inv[i] = 1LL * (P - P / i) * inv[P % i] % P;
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n, m;
    std::cin >> n >> m;
    a[0] = 1;
    for (int i = 1, k = 2 * n + 2; i <= m; i++) {
      if (i <= k) {
        a[i] = 1LL * a[i - 1] * inv[i] % P * (k - i + 1) % P;
      } else {
        a[i] = 0;
      }
    }
    if (n + 1 <= m) inc(a[n + 1], n & 1 ? P - 1 : 1);
    for (int i = 0; i <= m; i++) {
      a[i + 1] = (a[i + 1] + (P - 3LL) * a[i]) % P;
      inc(a[i + 2], P - a[i]);
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
      std::cout << a[i] << " ";
    }
    std::cout << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

Ink on paper

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Thu Aug 12 12:09:31 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n;
    std::cin >> n;
    std::vector<PII> a(n);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
      std::cin >> a[i].first >> a[i].second;
    }
    std::vector<int> vis(n);
    vis[0] = 1;
#define double LL
#define sqrt(x) (x)
    std::vector<double> min(n, 2e18);
    auto sqr = [&](double x) { return x * x; };
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
      min[i] = sqrt(sqr(a[i].first - a[0].first) + sqr(a[i].second - a[0].second));
    }
    double ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
      double mi = 2e18;
      int x = -1;
      for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
        if (!vis[j] && smin(mi, min[j])) x = j;
      }
      assert(~x);
      smax(ans, min[x]);
      vis[x] = 1;
      for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
        if (!vis[j]) smin(min[j], sqrt(sqr(a[x].first - a[j].first) + sqr(a[x].second - a[j].second)));
      }
    }
    std::cout << ans << "\n";
  }
  
  return 0;
}

Counting Stars

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Thu Aug 12 12:32:44 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;
constexpr int P(998244353);
inline void inc(int &x, int y) {
  x += y;
  if (x >= P) x -= P;
}
inline int mod(LL x) {
  return x % P;
}
int fpow(int x, int k = P - 2) {
  int r = 1;
  for (; k; k >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P) {
    if (k & 1) r = 1LL * r * x % P;
  }
  return r;
}
constexpr int N(1e6 + 5);
int a[N], pw[N];
int sum[N << 2], b[N << 2], tag[N << 2], max[N << 2];
#define ls o << 1
#define rs o << 1 | 1
int sumMod(int x, int y) {
  return x + y >= P ? x + y - P : x + y;
}
void pushup(int o) {
  sum[o] = sumMod(sum[ls], sum[rs]);
  b[o] = sumMod(b[ls], b[rs]);
  max[o] = std::max(max[ls], max[rs]);
}
void modify(int o, int x) {
  tag[o] += x;
  sum[o] = (sum[o] + 1LL * (pw[x] - 1) * b[o]) % P;
  b[o] = 1LL * b[o] * pw[x] % P;
}
void pushdown(int o) {
  if (tag[o]) {
    modify(ls, tag[o]);
    modify(rs, tag[o]);
    tag[o] = 0;
  }
}
void update1(int o, int l, int r, int x, int y) {
  if (max[o] == 0) return;
  if (l == r) {
    max[o]--;
    if (max[o]) {
      int x = a[l] & -a[l];
      inc(sum[o], P - x);
      a[l] -= x;
    } else {
      sum[o] = 0;
      b[o] = 0;
      tag[o] = 0;
      a[l] = 0;
    }
    return;
  }
  pushdown(o);
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  if (x <= m) update1(ls, l, m, x, y);
  if (y > m) update1(rs, m + 1, r, x, y);
  pushup(o);
}
void update2(int o, int l, int r, int x, int y) {
  if (x <= l && r <= y) {
    modify(o, 1);
    return;
  }
  pushdown(o);
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  if (x <= m) update2(ls, l, m, x, y);
  if (y > m) update2(rs, m + 1, r, x, y);
  pushup(o);
}
int ask(int o, int l, int r, int x, int y) {
  if (r < x || y < l) return 0;
  if (x <= l && r <= y) return sum[o];
  pushdown(o);
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  return sumMod(ask(ls, l, m, x, y), ask(rs, m + 1, r, x, y));
}
void build(int o, int l, int r) {
  tag[o] = 0;
  if (l == r) {
    if (a[l]) {
      sum[o] = a[l] % P;
      max[o] = __builtin_popcount(a[l]);
      b[o] = (1 << std::__lg(a[l])) % P;
    } else {
      sum[o] = max[o] = b[o] = 0;
    }
    
    return;
  }
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  build(ls, l, m), build(rs, m + 1, r);
  pushup(o);
}

void solve() {
  int n;
  std::cin >> n;
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
    std::cin >> a[i];
  }
  build(1, 1, n);
  int q;
  std::cin >> q;
  while (q--) {
    int opt, l, r;
    std::cin >> opt >> l >> r;
    if (opt == 1) {
      std::cout << ask(1, 1, n, l, r) << "\n";
    } else if (opt == 2) {
      update1(1, 1, n, l, r);
    } else {
      update2(1, 1, n, l, r);
    }
  }
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  pw[0] = 1;
  for (int i = 1; i <= 1e5; i++) pw[i] = 2LL * pw[i - 1] % P;
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    solve();
  }
  return 0;
}

Separated Number

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Thu Aug 12 13:41:13 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

namespace Polynomial {
using Poly = std::vector<int>;
constexpr int P(998244353), G(3);
inline void inc(int &x, int y) { (x += y) >= P ? x -= P : 0; }
inline int mod(int64_t x) { return x % P; }
inline int fpow(int x, int k = P - 2) {
  int r = 1;
  for (; k; k >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P)
    if (k & 1) r = 1LL * r * x % P;
  return r;
}
template <int N>
std::array<int, N> getOmega() {
  std::array<int, N> w;
  for (int i = N >> 1, x = fpow(G, (P - 1) / N); i; i >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P) {
    w[i] = 1;
    for (int j = 1; j < i; j++) w[i + j] = 1LL * w[i + j - 1] * x % P;
  }
  return w;
}
auto w = getOmega<1 << 22>();
Poly &operator*=(Poly &a, int b) { for (auto &x : a) x = 1LL * x * b % P; return a; }
Poly operator*(Poly a, int b) { return a *= b; }
Poly operator*(int a, Poly b) { return b * a; }
Poly &operator/=(Poly &a, int b) { return a *= fpow(b); }
Poly operator/(Poly a, int b) { return a /= b; }
Poly &operator+=(Poly &a, Poly b) {
  a.resize(std::max(a.size(), b.size()));
  for (int i = 0; i < b.size(); i++) inc(a[i], b[i]);
  return a;
}
Poly operator+(Poly a, Poly b) { return a += b; }
Poly &operator-=(Poly &a, Poly b) {
  a.resize(std::max(a.size(), b.size()));
  for (int i = 0; i < b.size(); i++) inc(a[i], P - b[i]);
  return a;
}
Poly operator-(Poly a, Poly b) { return a -= b; }
Poly operator-(Poly a) { for (auto &x : a) x ? x = P - x : 0; return a; }
Poly &operator>>=(Poly &a, int x) {
  if (x >= (int)a.size()) {
    a.clear();
  } else {
    a.erase(a.begin(), a.begin() + x);
  }
  return a;
}
Poly &operator<<=(Poly &a, int x) {
  a.insert(a.begin(), x, 0);
  return a;
}
Poly operator>>(Poly a, int x) { return a >>= x; }
Poly operator<<(Poly a, int x) { return a <<= x; }
inline Poly &dotEq(Poly &a, Poly b) {
  assert(a.size() == b.size());
  for (int i = 0; i < a.size(); i++) a[i] = 1LL * a[i] * b[i] % P;
  return a;
}
inline Poly dot(Poly a, Poly b) { return dotEq(a, b); }
void norm(Poly &a) {
  if (!a.empty()) {
    a.resize(1 << std::__lg(a.size() * 2 - 1));
  }
}
void dft(int *a, int n) {
  assert((n & n - 1) == 0);
  for (int k = n >> 1; k; k >>= 1) {
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i += k << 1) {
      for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {
        int y = a[i + j + k];
        a[i + j + k] = 1LL * (a[i + j] - y + P) * w[k + j] % P;
        inc(a[i + j], y);
      }
    }
  }
}
void idft(int *a, int n) {
  assert((n & n - 1) == 0);
  for (int k = 1; k < n; k <<= 1) {
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i += k << 1) {
      for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {
        int x = a[i + j], y = 1LL * a[i + j + k] * w[k + j] % P;
        a[i + j + k] = x - y < 0 ? x - y + P : x - y;
        inc(a[i + j], y);
      }
    }
  }
  for (int i = 0, inv = P - (P - 1) / n; i < n; i++)
    a[i] = 1LL * a[i] * inv % P;
  std::reverse(a + 1, a + n);
}
void dft(Poly &a) { dft(a.data(), a.size()); }
void idft(Poly &a) { idft(a.data(), a.size()); }
Poly operator*(Poly a, Poly b) {
  int len = a.size() + b.size() - 1;
  if (a.size() <= 8 || b.size() <= 8) {
    Poly c(len);
    for (size_t i = 0; i < a.size(); i++)
      for (size_t j = 0; j < b.size(); j++)
        c[i + j] = (c[i + j] + 1LL * a[i] * b[j]) % P;
    return c;
  }
  int n = 1 << std::__lg(len - 1) + 1;
  a.resize(n), b.resize(n);
  dft(a), dft(b);
  dotEq(a, b);
  idft(a);
  a.resize(len);
  return a;
}
}
using namespace Polynomial;
constexpr int N(2e6 + 5);
int fac[N], ifac[N], pw[N], ipw[N];
void init(int n) {
  pw[0] = ipw[0] = 1;
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) pw[i] = pw[i - 1] * 10LL % P;
  ipw[1] = fpow(10);
  for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) ipw[i] = 1LL * ipw[i - 1] * ipw[1] % P;
  fac[0] = ifac[0] = 1;
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) fac[i] = 1LL * fac[i - 1] * i % P;
  ifac[n] = fpow(fac[n]);
  for (int i = n - 1; i; i--) ifac[i] = 1LL * ifac[i + 1] * (i + 1) % P;
}
int bin(int n, int m) {
  if (m < 0 || m > n) return 0;
  return 1LL * fac[n] * ifac[m] % P * ifac[n - m] % P;
}
int val[N], sum[N];
void solve() {
  int k;
  std::string s;
  std::cin >> k >> s;
  int n = s.length();
  val[0] = 0;
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
    val[i] = (val[i - 1] * 10LL + s[i - 1] - '0') % P;
  }
  int ans = val[n];
  if (k >= 2) {
    int s1 = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
      ans = mod(ans + (val[n] - 1LL * val[i] * pw[n - i] + val[n - i]) % P * s1);
      s1 = (s1 * 2LL - bin(i - 1, k - 2)) % P;
    }
  }
  if (k >= 3) {
    Poly f(n), g(n);
    f[n - 3] = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i < n - 2; i++) f[n - 3 - i] = (f[n - 2 - i] * 2LL - bin(i - 1, k - 3) + P) % P;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) g[i - 1] = 1LL * val[i] * ipw[i] % P;
    g = f * g;
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) inc(f[i], f[i - 1]);
    for (int i = 2; i < n; i++) {
      ans = (ans + 1LL * val[i] * f[i - 2] - 1LL * pw[i] * g[i - 2]) % P;
    }
  }
  std::cout << (ans % P + P) % P << "\n";
}
int main() {
  // freopen("t.in", "r", stdin);
  // freopen("t.out", "w", stdout);
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  init(1e6);
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    solve();
  }
  return 0;
}

A Simple Problem

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Fri Aug 13 09:10:19 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int N(2e5 + 5);
inline char gc() {
  static constexpr int BufferSize = 1 << 22 | 5;
  static char buf[BufferSize], *p, *q;
  static std::streambuf *i = std::cin.rdbuf();
  return p == q ? p = buf, q = p + i->sgetn(p, BufferSize), p == q ? EOF : *p++ : *p++;
}
struct Reader {
  template <class T>
  Reader &operator>>(T &w) {
    char c, p = 0;
    for (; !std::isdigit(c = gc());) if (c == '-') p = 1;
    for (w = c & 15; std::isdigit(c = gc()); w = w * 10 + (c & 15)) ;
    if (p) w = -w;
    return *this;
  }
} cin;

struct Node {
  Node *ls, *rs;
  int val, add, mid;
} t[N * 30], *cur;
int n, k, q, cnt;
void update(Node *&o, int l, int r, int x, int y, int z) {
  if (o == t) {
    o = cur++;
    *o = {t, t, 0, 0, 0};
  }
  if (x <= l && r <= y) {
    o->val += z;
    o->add += z;
    return;
  }
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  if (x < m) update(o->ls, l, m, x, y, z);
  if (y > m) update(o->rs, m, r, x, y, z);
  o->val = std::max(o->ls->val, o->rs->val) + o->add;
}
int cal(Node *o, int l, int r, int x, int y) {
  Node *p = o->ls, *q = o->rs;
  int m = l + r >> 1, c = p->add, d = q->add;
  while (m - l > 1) {
    p = p->rs;
    c += p->add;
    l = l + m >> 1;
  }
  while (r - m > 1) {
    q = q->ls;
    d += q->add;
    r = r + m >> 1;
  }
  int ans = 1e9, a = -1e9, b = -1e9;
  l = 0, r = k;
  while (r - l > 1) {
    m = l + r >> 1;
    if (m <= x || m < y && std::max(a, c + p->rs->val) >= std::max(b, d + q->ls->val)) {
      if (x <= m && m < y) smin(ans, std::max({a, c + p->rs->val, b, d + q->ls->val}));
      l = m;   
      smax(b, d + q->ls->val);
      p = p->rs, q = q->rs;
      c += p->add, d += q->add;
    } else {     
      if (x <= m && m < y) smin(ans, std::max({a, c + p->rs->val, b, d + q->ls->val}));
      r = m;
      smax(a, c + p->rs->val);
      p = p->ls, q = q->ls;
      c += p->add, d += q->add;
    }
  }
  return ans;
}
void add(Node *&o, int l, int r, int x, int y, int z) { // [l * k, r * k), [x, y)
  if (o == t) {
    o = cur++;
    *o = {t, t, 0, 0, 0};
  }
  if (x <= l * k && r * k <= y) {
    o->val += z;
    o->add += z;
    return;
  }
  if (r - l == 1) {
    update(o, 0, k, std::max(0, x - l * k), std::min(k, y - l * k), z);
    return;
  }
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  if (x < m * k) add(o->ls, l, m, x, y, z);
  if (y > m * k) add(o->rs, m, r, x, y, z);
  if (x <= (m - 1) * k && y >= (m + 1) * k) {
    o->mid += z;
  } else if (m == x / k || m == y / k || m - 1 == x / k || m - 1 == y / k) {
    o->mid = cal(o, l, r, 0, k);
  }
  o->val = std::min({o->ls->val, o->rs->val, o->mid}) + o->add;
}
int ask(Node *o, int l, int r, int x, int y) {
  if (x <= l * k && r * k <= y) return o->val;
  int m = l + r >> 1, ans = 1e9;
  if (x <= (m - 1) * k) smin(ans, ask(o->ls, l, m, x, y));
  if (y >= (m + 1) * k) smin(ans, ask(o->rs, m, r, x, y));
  if (x <= (m - 1) * k && y >= (m + 1) * k) {
    smin(ans, o->mid);
  } else if (x < m * k && m * k < y) {
    smin(ans, cal(o, l, r, std::max(0, x - (m - 1) * k), std::min(k, y - m * k + 1)));
  }
  return ans + o->add;
}

void solve() {
  cur = t + 1;
  cin >> n >> k >> q;
  int m = (n - 1) / k + 1;
  Node *root = t;
  while (q--) {
    int opt, l, r, x;
    cin >> opt >> l >> r;
    l--;
    if (opt == 1) {
      cin >> x;
      add(root, 0, m, l, r, x);
    } else {
      std::cout << ask(root, 0, m, l, r) << "\n";
    }
  }
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  *t = {t, t, 0, 0, 0};
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    solve();
  }
  return 0;
}
